title: Add a Driver to an Auto Policy
description: A policyholder wants to add their newly licensed teenage son to their auto insurance policy.

tasks.description: Identify the policyholder and retrieve their current policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer's account.

tasks.description: Collect the new driver's information (name, date of birth, driver's license number).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately captures the new driver's details.

tasks.description: Add the new driver to the policy and calculate the change in premium.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the driver and informs the policyholder of the new, higher premium.
